page.title: 06WILCOX AND SONS 1
page.content: Mr Wilcox has got a firm at Holme Lacy. Apart from two brothers who have a joinery business in one of his sheds, it is the{only business in the {village. }It is a precision engineering firm, which mainly{designs {and makes machinery for sawmills. Because of the{coal miners' strike, the sawmills have been short of business and some have closed, so Mr Wilcox does a lot of work designing and making machinery for anyone who gives him the orders. When we visited his works, they were making cogs for a printing firm in London. Some of the machines were quite old, but most of them are{very modern - such as a laser cutter for cutting out shapes from flat metal. Like most of his modern equipment, it is{controlled {by computer.
